div.span: Adapted from Inventory of Greek Coin Hoards

div.pre: 2278 Salaro (= Bultei), 55 km. SE of Sas- (891) sari, Sardinia, 1934 Burial: c. 250 B.C. (Jenkins) Contents: 292 AE Carthage: 2 Sicilian mint (as SNGCop. 102) 290 Sardinian mint (as SNGCop. 144) Disposition: Cagliari Taramelli, NSc 1934, pp. 200-4
